name: Nystatin
indications: nystatin oral suspension indicated treatment candidiasis oral cavity .
warningsAndPrecautions: nystatin oral suspension usp , 100,000 usp nystatin units per ml , available cherry , peppermint flavored , light creamy yellow , ready-to-use suspension , supplied following oral forms : ndc 0904-7276-41 : 5 ml unit dose cup ndc 0904-7276-92 : case contains 50 unit dose cups 5 ml , packaged 5 trays 10 unit dose cups ndc 0904-7276-70 : case contains 100 unit dose cups 5 ml , packaged 10 trays 10 unit dose cups
adverseReactions: preparation contraindicated patients history hypersensitivity components .
indications_original: Nystatin Oral Suspension is indicated for the treatment of candidiasis in the oral cavity.
warningsAndPrecautions_original:
Nystatin Oral Suspension USP, 100,000 USP Nystatin Units per mL, is available in a cherry, peppermint flavored, light creamy yellow, ready-to-use suspension, supplied in the following oral dosage forms:
                  NDC 0904-7276-41: 5 mL unit dose cup
       
 
  NDC 0904-7276-92: Case contains 50 unit dose cups of 5 mL, packaged in 5 trays of 10 unit dose cups each
       
 
  NDC 0904-7276-70: Case contains 100 unit dose cups of 5 mL, packaged in 10 trays of 10 unit dose cups each
adverseReactions_original: The preparation is contraindicated in patients with a history of hypersensitivity to any of its components.
